summary: Swaps the Armor Rating of the Daedric and Dragonplate Armor
descriptionHtml:
After the Release of Skyrim, Akatosh was angry because the Armor from the bones of his creatures - the Dragons - wasn\'t the best in the game. He suspected that the Daedra had their hands in the game and manipulated the development. So he sent me a command in my dream: \"You shall produce a mod to make the Dragonbone Armor stronger than the Armor of these Daedric fools!\" And so i followed his order and made this mod.

This mod swaps the Armor Rating of the Daedric and the Dragonplate Armor

COMPATIBILITY:
Is not compatible with any mod changing the Daedric nor the Dragonplate Armor.
(texture mods are ok)

NOTE:
Changes the unplayable Dremora Armor too

I\'m NOT responsible for any harm or damage caused by hunting Dragons.

*sorry for my bad english, it\'s not my native language* 

Thanks to:
- Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit
author: xMaster2072
